snippet: Andrea Jung, who was pushed out as chief executive last December, had been expected to remain as chairwoman for at least two years.
abstract: Andrea Jung, who resigned as chief executive of Avon products in late 2011, announces that she will also step down as executive chairwoman of the company.
lead_paragraph: Andrea Jung, who was pushed out as chief executive last December, had been expected to remain as chairwoman for at least two years.

headline.main: Avon Chairwoman to Quit Earlier Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Avon Chairwoman to Quit Earlier Than Was Expected
